predicate.note: Frames file for 'revive' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison.

roleset.name: bring back to life

example.name: nice and simple
example.text: One investment banker said Mr. Steinberg may be trying to position himself as a friendly investor who could help UAL Chairman Stephen Wolf revive a failed labor-management bid.

example.name: targetless traces
example.text: Although takeover experts said they doubted Mr. Steinberg will make a bid by himself, the application by his Reliance Group Holdings Inc. could signal his interest in *trace* helping *trace* revive a failed labor-management bid.

roleset.note: Resolving trace chains seems particularly difficult for this verb; dunno why.
